docs.snippet: Jackson is coming off a career-best season, having led Philadelphia with 82 catches for 1,332 yards and 9 touchdowns. He was due to make $10.25 million for the 2014 season....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jackson is coming off a career-best season, having led Philadelphia with 82 catches for 1,332 yards and 9 touchdowns. He was due to make $10.25 million for the 2014 season.
docs.abstract: Philadelphia Eagles release Pro Bowl wide receiver DeSean Jackson after six seasons with team, saying they were unable to find a taker on the trade market.
